oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite of David Preston Sherfy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte de visite of David Preston Sherfy. Sherfy, using the alias George W. Garber, enlisted in Co. H, 1st Ill. Cav. Regt. at Cairo, Ill., on July 17, 1861. He was promoted to full corporal and mustered out on July 5, 1862. He enlisted in Co. C, 11th Ill. Inf. Regt. later that month. In 1863, as a sergeant, he transferred to Co. M, 3rd US Colored Cavalry. See "David Preston Sherfy: Kinsman and Cavalryman" by George W. Holley for more information.
